prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Drums, Bass, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the Pipe, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, but not the Piano.

Style 2:
The Pipe, Drums, Bass, and Guitar are all present in this song, but the Piano is absent.

Style 3:
This song is composed of the Pipe, Drums, Bass, and Guitar, with no Piano included.
